concept.title: Touchdown Blitz
concept.description: A fast-paced, top-down 2D arcade football game where you, a lone running back, must outmaneuver two relentless defenders to reach the endzone. Master jukes, speed bursts, and strategic dodges to achieve gridiron glory!
concept.theme: Vibrant, stylized American football stadium with a slightly retro arcade feel.
concept.objective: Successfully carry the football into the opponent's endzone before being tackled by the two designated defenders.
mechanics: Player movement and control (WASD or arrow keys for movement, spacebar for sprint/boost).
Dodge/Juke system: Quick directional inputs while moving to evade tackles.
Tackle detection: Defenders will attempt to tackle the player if they get too close and the player isn't actively dodging.
player_abilities: Sprint/Speed Burst: Temporarily increases player speed for quick escapes or closing distance.
Juke Move: A rapid directional change to fake out defenders and make them miss tackles.
Stumble Recovery: A brief period of invincibility after a successful juke or if the player is bumped but not tackled, allowing for quick recovery.

enemies.name: The Pursuer
enemies.behavior: Follows the player directly, attempting to close the distance for a tackle. Its speed increases slightly as the player gets closer to the endzone.

enemies.name: The Flanker
enemies.behavior: Patrols a wider area, attempting to cut off escape routes and intercept the player's path to the endzone. It has a slightly slower base speed but can anticipate player movements.

powerups.name: Energy Drink
powerups.effect: Instantly refills the player's sprint meter and provides a short burst of increased acceleration.

powerups.name: Magnetic Boots
powerups.effect: For a short duration, defenders will have a harder time tackling the player, causing their tackles to whiff more often.

concept.level_progression: Levels are designed as increasingly difficult courses with varying field layouts, obstacles (like cones or other non-tackling players), and defender spawn points. Each successful touchdown progresses the player to a new, more challenging field.
concept.scoring_system: Each successful touchdown awards 6 points. Additionally, collecting bonus items on the field (e.g., coins, extra stamina pickups) grants points that contribute to a high score. The goal is to achieve the highest score by completing multiple touchdowns.
concept.visual_style: Clean, vibrant 2D pixel art with a slightly chunky, retro aesthetic. Distinct team colors for the player and defenders. Dynamic camera that slightly zooms out when the player sprints and zooms in during close tackle attempts.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, driving 8-bit or chiptune soundtrack that ramps up in intensity during chase sequences. Satisfying 'whoosh' sound for sprints, a sharp 'swerve' for jukes, a solid 'thud' for tackles, and a triumphant fanfare for touchdowns.

level_design.name: The Practice Field
level_design.description: Welcome to Touchdown Blitz! This is your introductory level. Learn the ropes of movement, dodging, and tackling. Focus on collecting scattered tokens and getting familiar with the basic defenders.

objectives.description: Reach the end zone at the opposite side of the field.
